ygData.subject: RE: I have quit Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny.  How come these few days I keep getting out-dated and repeating mails from the list?  *scratched head* Ziltus
ygData.messageBody:
Funny. How come these few days I keep getting 'out-dated' and repeating mails from the list? *scratched head*

Ziltus

On Tuesday, 26 October, 1999 5:26 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> Hi all,
> Dued to my failure at PoF which got alot of ppl into trouble (which
> involved dying and losing the major portion of their stuff) and with little
> else to do (except like camping for stuff, which I have gotten very sick and
> tired of), I have cancelled my account as from today, Oct 26th 1999. Zand,
> please give out the items to the people as I have listed down with you.
> Especially Weadaenye, whom I'm guilty as hell to got her into a living hell.
>
> Please help me tell the follow people of my quiting and hope to see
> them again sometime on another game another time and Best wishes to them.
>
> Daedor, Aildiin, Iyenya, Ironbuket, Hoppy, Kitiarra, Stella,
> Saintly, Valadine, Millie, Silph, Lunatictiara, Ader, Fost, Sparrow,
> Demitry, Wlyven, Anima and Nismo/Volk (they are brothers sharing the same
> account).
>
> Everquest was, had been and enjoyable game at the beginning but due
> to the way that the game is designed it reminds me more of Evercamp,
> Everbitch etc etc. It has become a torture to enter the "game" each day now.
> This incident has at least freed me from Evercrack as some would say it is.
> So farewell my fellow guildmates. And may your time in Everquest be as your
> first day, with new and exciting adventures each day.
>
> Garren The Broken Paladin.
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
